name: DELIVERY_LIV_STS
description: This table contains whether the newborn was born alive. This table contains choices selected in Stork's Delivery Summary activity, and is populated in the delivery record. This information is also copied to the OB_EPT_BH_LIVING table in the baby's Patient (EPT) record.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEL_LIVING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the category value for the living status of the newborn at the time of delivery. This information is stored in the Delivery Record.
